requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+)
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Almost any graphics card
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any
  • VR Support: n/a
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+)
  • Processor: Intel i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Slightly better graphics card
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any
  • VR Support: n/a

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 3100 or Intel Core I3 7100
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD RX 580 or Nvidia GTX 1070
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 720P 30FPS
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 3700 or Core I7 10700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD RX 5700 or Nvidia RTX 2070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080P 60FPS
